title: OPELâ€™AMUWA
content:
Chrs: Opelamuwa/3x Eledumare Baba gbope e wa

1. Iwoyi esi wa re o Baba a tun mo pee wa wa

Awimayehun a so po se o eledunmare gbopee wa

Chrs: Opelamuwa/3x Eledumare Baba gbope e wa

2. Anlo anbo layo irinajo wa komewu dani ore - ofe Re lawa rigba o Emi- mimo gbope wa

Chrs: Opelamuwa/3x Eledumare Baba gbope e wa

3. Awa mare alaye okan Baba mimo gbope ewa a o daku, a o yo sonu ninu ijo won o wawati

Chrs: Opelamuwa/3x Eledumare baba gbope e wa

Solo: Eledumare baba gbope e wa

All: Eledumare baba gbope e wa

Solo: Titi aye la o ma yin o o emi mimo gbopeewa

All: Eledumare baba gbope e wa

Solo: Ajodun odun eyi o baba o tun so juu wa

All: Eledumare baba gbope e wa

Solo: Emimimo a dupe o lori egbe akorin

All: Eledumare baba gbope e wa

Solo: Adupe lori adari o won o siwa dari

All: Eledumare baba gbope e wa

Solo: A dupe lori gbogbo ijo oju wa tun r’odun o

All: Eledumare baba gbope e wa

Solo: Adupe lori adari o won o siwa dari

All: Eledumare baba gbope e wa

title: IKOKO OGA OGO
content:
Chrs: Eniti o joko nibi ikoko oga ogo, ni yio ma gbe abeojiji Olodunmare, Ohun kohun to wu ko le de- le de, agbujo le o baba wa, bi aja ba leni lehin – dajudaju yio le pa ikoko o

1. Foya kosi fun Daniel ni ho kinihun t’agbe si, ni toripe o gbadura osi gbekele re le Olorun.

Chrs: Eniti o joko nibi ikoko oga ogo, ni yio ma gbe abeojiji Olodunmare, Ohun kohun to wu ko le de- le de, agbojo le o baba wa, bi aja ba leni lehin – dajudaju yio le pa ikoko o

2. Abdnego at’ egbere ko farapa ninu ina tori angeli Olorun wa pelu won ninu ina na.

Chrs: Eniti o joko nibi ikoko oga ogo, ni yio ma gbe abe ojiji Olodunmare, Ohun kohun to wu ko le de-le de, agbojo le o baba wa, bi aja ba leni lehin – dajudaju yio le pa ikoko o

3. Ileri Olorun nbi fun wa yoso ninu iwe mimo egberun yo subu legbe wa ate gbarun lapa otun sugbon kiyo sunmo odo wa bena ni oro olorun so.

Chrs: Eniti o joko nibi ikoko oga ogo, ni yio ma gbe abeojiji Olodunmare, Ohun kohun to wu ko le de-le de, agbojo le o baba wa, bi aja ba leni lehin – dajudaju yio le pa ikoko o

4. Eyin ara oni gbagbo, esu fe lati dan yin wo, egbadura fun ranlowo, ki gbagbo yin le duro dopin.

He that dwells in the secret place of the most high God, shall abide under the shadow of the most high God.

title: MO TI NI OLUGBALA KAN
content:
Chrs: Ah emi ti ri Olugbala kan ah o femi ah o femi, ah emi tini Olusoaguntan kan ah o femi.

1. Olorun fe araye to be gee tofi fomo re kan soso fun wa enikeni to ba Gbagbo o yio riye.

Chrs: Ah emi ti ri olugbala kan ah o femi ah o femi, ah emi tini Olusoaguntan kan ah o femi.

2. Won de lade egun, won tuto si lara, won fun loti kikan mu o o, nitori emi ati re, emi tini baba agba kan o o, k’ogbowo koto s’egbala mi, emi ti l’ololufe kan ah o femi

Chrs: Ah emi ti ri olugbala kan ah o femi ah o femi, ah emi tini Olusoaguntan kan ah o femi.

3. Nigbati mo sako lo oo, s’ebiwo lope mi wa sagbo nigbati ko s’alabaro mo ah femi, emi ti l’olowori kan oo, moti lalagbawi kan, emi ti l’’ololufe kan ah o femi.

Chrs: Ah emi ti ri olugbala kan ah o femi ah o femi, ah emi tini Olusoaguntan kan ah o femi.

title: ALPHA OMEGA
content:
Alfa, Omega o, o (2ce)

Iwo ni ibere iwo ni opin

Oro re kale, lorun o,

Oro re kale laye

Oro gbenu omo eniyan f’ohun mesaya o

Ohun taba f’oruko e bere o dase

Ase o oba igbala, oro re lase o

Bami o, mo juba o

1. Oba awi ma tase o, asoro maye

Tase- tase, o , ota orun

Bi aso tita

Tase – tase o, o, gbele jade ninu omi

Je koro re le ma gbenu mi o

Kin le se rere, fun mi lagbara

Kinle ba o joba ni kehin

Awa ma ridi ni se re o

Bami o, mo juba o

2. Oba awi ma tase o, a soro ma ye

Iwo lo pase f’ojo o o, ojo yo

Iwo lo pase f’oorun, orun ran

Ona ara ni kogbe temi gba o

Baba bami se o bi wo ba pase ayo

Ire ayo, a te mi lowo,

Awa ma ridi, ni ‘se re o, bami o mo juba o o o o o o o o

title: ORO RE KALE NI ORUN
content:
Chrs: Lai Oluwa oro re o

O ka ‘le ni orun/2x

1. Ni atetekose ni oro ma tiwa eyin ara

Oro na siwa pelu Olorun, Olorun ni oro ‘yen

Oro yi lotun wa pelu Olorun, ni atetekose,

Oro Olorun ye, iyebiyeni

Oro Olorun ye okale ni orun

Chrs: Lai Oluwa oro re o

O ka ‘le ni orun /2x

2. Ni atetekose Olorun da orun ohun aye

Aye siwa ni juju, okunkun su b’aye

Nipa oro Olorun, latun f da’ye

Nitori ko so hun to foju han lafi d’ohun t’a nri

Oro Olorun o lomu ohun gbogbo duro

Leyin oro yi kotun sohun miran, taa tun da

Chrs: Lai Oluwa oro re o

O ka ‘le ni orun /2x

3. Igbala nbe ninu oro re, odawa lo ju

Iwosan nbe ninu oro re, oye wa yeke/2x

Nigba idamu won, aba atila kosi fun won mo

Won kep’Oluwa, Oluwa ran oro re, osi gba won la ninu iparun/2x

Oro Olorun ye iyebiyeni

Oro Olorun ye okale ni orun

Chrs: Lai Oluwa oro re o

Oka ‘le ni orun /2x

4. Ohun gbogbo t’ Oluwa da

Gbogbo re ad’opin, oro olorun o ni kan na laaku, lati se ‘dajo/2x

Koriko nro, itanna sin re patapata

Oro Olorun o nikan laaku lati se ‘dajo

Int: (Oluwa ran oro re)

Chrs: Lai Oluwa oro re o

Oka ‘le ni orun /2x

Solo: Osi mu wa larada

All: Osi mu wa larada etc

Chrs: Lai Oluwa oro re o

Oka ‘le ni orun /2x

Kama tanra wajegegebi idele

Kama tanrawa idele onigbagbo

Ko seni tikole sasise, kaya omo

Emi lebi, rawo oko fa mora, ki ile wa ko le toro gege bi omi afowuropon.

Emi o feran re, feran oko mi/ 2x

Ife lokun to sole aye ro

Emi o feranre feran okomi

Se iwo yo feran re, feran ayare/2x

Ife lokun to sole aye ro

Se iwo yo feran re, feran ayare.

Ka; oferan ara wa, feran ara wa/2x

Ife lokun to sole ayero

Kajo feran ara wa, feran ara wa.

title: ALL IN ALL
content:
1. Jesus Lamb of God worthy is your name/2x

You are my strength when I am weak

You are the treasure that I seek

You are my all in all.

2. Seeking you as a precious jewel

But to give up l’d be a fool

You are my all in all.

Refain: Jesus Lamb of God worthy is your name/2x

3. Taken my cross my sin my shame

Rising again I bless your name

You are my all in all.

When I fall down you pick me up

When I am dry you fill my cup

You are my all in all

Refain: Jesus lamb of God worthy is your name/2x
